content: For release on delivery  11:00 a.m. EDT (9:00 a.m. MDT)  June 27, 2018      America’s Vital Interest in Global Efforts to Promote Financial Stability       Remarks by     Randal K. Quarles      Vice Chairman for Supervision     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at     Utah Bankers Association 110th Annual Convention      Sun Valley Inn     Sun Valley, Idaho.      June 27, 2018
